3.8. Extensions 22
 Incorporate the model into software for making predictions.
If you have time, you can always circle back to the previous step and see if you can further
improve upon the ﬁnal model. This may be required periodically if the data changes signiﬁcantly
over time.
3.8 Extensions
This section lists some ideas for extending the tutorial that you may wish to explore.
